[i]Dig [/i]– Whenever Velouria, Little Segnergirl deals combat damage to a player, you may cloak her and up to one target creature. [i](To cloak a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
[i]Deep[/i] – Whenever Velouria is turned face up, you may return target artifact or land card from your graveyard to your hand. You may play an additional land this turn.
Disguise {G}{B} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]
